Vai iespējams salabot tenta angāru?: Is it possible to repair a tent hangar?
Tenta angāru tentu ir iespējams salabot: It is possible to repair the tent of the tent hangar without removing it from the metal structure (Tent repair kit or tent welding/gluing).
Kāds ir tenta kalpošanas laiks?: What is the lifespan of a tent?
Tenta kalpošanas laiks ir no 5 - 25 gadi: The lifespan of the tent is from 5 to 25 years (depends on the thickness of the tent and how the hangar itself is used).

Standarta aprīkojuma angāram ir divi vār: The standard hangar has two gates.
Vai vajag nostiprināt angāru pie zemes?: Does the hangar need to be anchored to the ground?
Obligāti! Katrs angārs jānostiprina pie: Absolutely! Each hangar must be anchored to the base. Anchors are included in the hangar package.

Vai ir iespējams savienot divus angārus: Is it possible to connect two hangars together?
Angārus ir iespējams savienot kopā tikai: It is possible to connect hangars together only at the ends.
Vai ir iespējams nosiltināt tikai angāru: Is it possible to insulate only the hangar?
Jā, ir iespējams nosiltināt angāru pašu: Yes, it is possible to insulate the hangar by yourself with Styrodur®, Isover®, Fastfixx®, Rockwool®, EPS
Vai ir iespējams iemontēt citus vārtus t: Is it possible to install other gates in the tent hangars?
Jā, konstrukcija atļauj iemontēt citus v: Yes, the structure allows for the installation of other gates.

Lauksaimniecības tehnikas uzglabāšanai u: Storage and repair of agricultural machinery

Kādiem nolūkiem tiek izmantoti tenta ang: For what purposes are tent hangars used?
Vairāk nekā 700 uzņēmumi un privātperson: More than 700 companies and individuals use our tent hangars for a wide variety of applications: storage, keeping animals and birds, growing vegetables. They have a simple structure that can be dismantled if needed, making it a perfect solution for both continuous storage and seasonal use.
Cik ātri var uzstādīt angāru?: How quickly can a hangar be installed?
Tenta angāri ir praktisks un ērts risinā: Tent hangars are a practical and convenient solution not only for storage but also for your upcoming celebrations. Usually, when planning an event with a large number of people, we start thinking about renting premises. Then, of course, a whole series of questions arise that need to be answered soon: where to find suitable premises that would be accessible to all guests; choose the entire building or just one of its rooms. Even if you find perfect premises in a convenient location, you may be disappointed with the answer that the chosen premises are already booked for the relevant time period. Similarly, the price can cause disappointment - if the premises are very spacious, you will likely have to pay a significant amount of money.
Protams, lai izvairītos no problēmām, ir: Of course, to avoid problems, other alternatives should also be explored, such as collapsible tent hangars.
Tenta angāriem ir daudz priekšrocību: ir: Tent hangars have many advantages: it is easy to find a suitable installation site, they are portable, and they can accommodate a large number of people. By choosing a hangar for an event, you will significantly save time looking for a venue - collapsible hangars can be built in any place where the ground surface is smooth and hard. Of course, when assembling, definitely pay attention to the dimensions of the tent hangar, as larger hangars require significantly more space.
Ir grūti noticēt, ka izīrēt izvēlētās te: It is hard to believe that renting selected premises for holidays or other events can happen in an instant. Of course, that is true. However, it is worth keeping in mind that when renting premises, time restrictions are set - specific hours are set for when you can arrive and when the premises must be vacated. The specified time for vacating the premises can sometimes cause misunderstanding or other unpleasant emotions. Meanwhile, events in hangars can go on indefinitely. Also, hangars are built very quickly, in just 1-2 days, so you won't have to wait long.
Tenta angāra cena atšķirās no telpu īres: The price of a tent hangar differs from the price of premises rental. Of course, in the short term, renting premises will likely cost less than purchasing a tent hangar, but in the long term, a tent hangar can pay for itself many times over. STOREX can also offer you another alternative - a tent hangar rental service, which will definitely not exceed your allocated budget.
Tenta angāri ir praktisks un ērts risinā: Tent hangars are a practical and convenient solution not only for storage but also for your upcoming celebrations.
